Articles.Content: Post your creations of mining ships for ore, I currently have one small vtol miner but I need some ideas and want to see some neat ships that I've seen people create!

Working on this thing:

![full.png](https://static.tweakers.net/ext/f/rHVBry5I4iNKo8CDlIUdv4AW/full.png)

(The VTOL engines are in the Mk2 bays). Would be cool if I could get it single stage to Minmus to refuel there, but I'm afraid that's not really possible in 1.02. I'm happy to get it single stage to low kerbin orbit...
